messages.msgSnippet: ... I know I know. My driver had a migraine and an ear infection and I was too chicken to drive to a strange place all by my lonesome. Next year wild horses
messages.messageBody:
On 16 Dec 02, at 9:54, kbcdlovejo@... wrote:

> In a message dated 12/16/2002 9:47:12 AM Eastern Standard Time,
> shyrley.williams@... writes:
>
>
> > Yeah but Ren, she's hard enough to get to visit. I been asking her
> > for months ;-)
> >
> > Shyrley
>
> She came all the way to Columbia, SC---and YOU didn't! <G>
>
> ~K
>

I know I know. My driver had a migraine and an ear infection and I
was too chicken to drive to a strange place all by my lonesome.
Next year wild horses wont keep me away.

Shyrley


"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."
